pr_title: New Basemaps: Network Analysis and OGC Categories

timeline.message: Find service areas for multiple facilities
OpenStreetMap Layer - set viewpoint on mapview

timeline.bodyText: In some samples we specify which basemap style, do we want to do this as a standard?
timeline.author: JonLavi

replies.bodyText:
Mostly the logic was that we'd include it if it said it previously since it was there, and not if it didn't as I personally don't think it adds anything when it's written there clearly in the ENUM. And in this specific case I removed it as it was incorrect anyway.
If we want it to be consistent one way or the other I can go back through. One for @Rachael-E to add to and see what we think if it's worth it. We can at least agree what we want going forward for new samples, and can add it as a line in the Contrib Guide.
replies.author: jenmerritt

timeline.bodyText: Same comment as above, do we want to specify the style everywhere, or is it just 'clutter'?
timeline.author: JonLavi

replies.bodyText: We've gone with consistently adding in create a map with the insert-name basemap style
replies.author: jenmerritt

timeline.bodyText: Nice catch on the import order here 👍
timeline.author: JonLavi
JonLavi

timeline.message: Tidy up comment and scale consistencies
